text: Hi, I start working with themes and I have a problem with `hs-watch`. Everything works well when I'm changing the HTML file but "Live preview with display options" doesn't work when I change the CSS file and I have to reload the page by hand. Any idea why it's happening?
watch doesnt reload your browser, it just watches your files and uploads them on change . You still have to refresh your browser.
i think the Live preview with display options only works if you're using the IDE
